verses.verse: To the chief Musician <WH5329> <WH8764>, A Psalm <WH4210> for the sons <WH1121> of Korach <WH7141>. O clap <WH8628> <WH8798> your hands <WH3709>, all ye people <WH5971>; shout <WH7321> <WH8685> unto 'Elohim <WH430> with the voice <WH6963> of triumph <WH7440>.
For the YY <WH3068> most high <WH5945> is terrible <WH3372> <WH8737>; he is a great <WH1419> King <WH4428> over all the earth <WH776>.
He shall subdue <WH1696> <WH8686> the people <WH5971> under us, and the nations <WH3816> under our feet <WH7272>.
He shall choose <WH977> <WH8799> our inheritance <WH5159> for us, the excellency <WH1347> of Ya`akov <WH3290> whom he loved <WH157> <WH8804>. Selah <WH5542>.
'Elohim <WH430> is gone up <WH5927> <WH8804> with a shout <WH8643>, the YY <WH3068> with the sound <WH6963> of a shofar <WH7782>.
Sing praises <WH2167> <WH8761> to 'Elohim <WH430>, sing praises <WH2167> <WH8761>: sing praises <WH2167> <WH8761> unto our King <WH4428>, sing praises <WH2167> <WH8761>.
For 'Elohim <WH430> is the King <WH4428> of all the earth <WH776>: sing ye praises <WH2167> <WH8761> with understanding <WH7919> <WH8688>.
'Elohim <WH430> reigneth <WH4427> <WH8804> over the heathen <WH1471>: 'Elohim <WH430> sitteth <WH3427> <WH8804> upon the throne <WH3678> of his holiness <WH6944>.

The princes <WH5081> of the people <WH5971> are gathered together <WH622> <WH8738>, even the people <WH5971> of the 'Elohim <WH430> of Avraham <WH85>: for the shields <WH4043> of the earth <WH776> belong unto 'Elohim <WH430>: he is greatly <WH3966> exalted <WH5927> <WH8738>.
